title.en: HELCOM HEAT (2): Combine the Samples (HOLAS mode)

description.en: Process to compute the HELCOM Annual Indicator for the HEAT assessment tool. HOLAS mode means that for the HOLAS periods, default spatial grids, configuration and default data is provided, which you can just use. You can also provide custom Bottle samples, which will then replace the default data. (Right now, CTD and PUMP data are not implemented, but can be, if required.) Please make sure the data you provide matches the time period (assessment period) you choose. (TODO: How does the tool deal with non-matching time periods? E.g. choose HOLAS 2 but provide data for different time period? How should we deal with this? Should we prevent this? If yes, how?). This process represents subpart 2 of the original HEAT assessment computation script. For more info, please go to: https://github.com/ices-tools-prod/HEAT/tree/master

links.title: GitHub repo for the original HEAT analysis

assessment_period.title: Assessment Period
assessment_period.description: Ask HELCOM. Example: HOLAS-2 (2011-2016), HOLAS-3 (2016-2021), or Other (1877-9999).

bottle_data.title: Input samples (bottle)
bottle_data.description: In-situ bottle sample data (nutrients, chl-a)(StationamplesBOT.csv). ICES Oceanographic data type 'BOT'. Write 'default' for default data. Leave out for none at all.

ctd_data.title: Input samples (CTD)
ctd_data.description: CTD depth profiles, relevant for oxygen debt indicator (StationSamplesCTD.csv). ICES Oceanographic data type 'CTD'. Write 'default' for default data. Leave out for none at all.

pump_data.title: Input samples (pump)
pump_data.description: Ferrybox data (chl-a) (StationSamplesPMP.csv). ICES Oceanographic data type 'PMP'. Write 'default' for default data. Leave out for none at all.

samples.title: Station samples (combined)
samples.description: Merged sample data of BOT, PMP and CTD data for indicator calculation (StationSamples.csv).

bottle_samples.title: Station samples (bottle)
bottle_samples.description: In-situ bottle sample data (nutrients, chl-a)(StationamplesBOT.csv). ICES Oceanographic data type 'BOT'.

pump_samples.title: Station samples (pump)
pump_samples.description: Ferrybox data (chl-a) (StationSamplesPMP.csv). ICES Oceanographic data type 'PMP'

ctd_samples.title: Station samples (CTD)
ctd_samples.description: CTD depth profiles, relevant for oxygen debt indicator (StationSamplesCTD.csv). ICES Oceanographic data type 'CTD'.

units_gridded.title: units_gridded.shp
units_gridded.description: Grid used for confidence assessment (10k ,30k, 60k), which was used for this process.
